-- Megatron --

Megatron glances at Wolfenstein and Skulletron as they 
enter. "Welcome to the Predacon base, as you may have already 
guessed, I'm Megatron." 

He walks up to the two, "Your lives are now forfeit, since should 
you decided to leave, you will be destroyed, and if you disobey me, 
you will also be destroyed. After telling you that, it is very 
simple, obey or die." The Pred leader smiles coldly, his tone of 
voice very obviously sincere.

With a curt nod, he turns and starts to head to the control room, 
ignoring any of the two newcomers's remarks. He'd heard most of 
Perceptor's conversation with the two to get a good enough idea of 
their general strengths. "Come, we have a few things to discuss 
before the next attack."
